env.info: (hold 11) (plate 12) (at 0 1) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 chair) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 cupboard) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (closed 3) (sort 4 closet) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (type 4 container) (opened 4) (sort 5 microwave) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 bottle) (size 6 small) (color 6 white) (sort 7 bottle) (size 7 small) (color 7 black) (sort 8 bottle) (size 8 small) (color 8 yellow) (sort 9 cup) (size 9 small) (color 9 white) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 white) (sort 11 remotecontrol) (size 11 small) (color 11 green) (sort 12 book) (size 12 small) (color 12 yellow)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y couch))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X chair))) )
test.nl: Do not pick up the white bottle. There must be yellow book on the plate. Put the bottle which is yellow on couch. Pick the book up. Put a cup in microwave. Go to chair.
